summary.span: 当实现时，对 值进行动画处理的抽象类。

span.span: See the [Custom Animations Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/custom-animations-overview.md) for information about extending animation classes.

summary.span: 创建此 的可修改克隆，从而深度复制此对象的值。

span.span: Creates a modifiable clone of this , making deep copies of this object's values.

summary.span: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。

span.span: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.

returns.span: 当前对象的可修改复本。

span.span: A modifiable clone of the current object.

returns.span: 即使源的 属性为 ，所克隆的对象的 属性也将为

span.span: The cloned object's property will be even if the source's property was

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结对象 (或任何对象)。This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen objects (or any object). 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .

span.span: Gets the current value of the animation.

MemberSignature.Value: public override sealed object GetCurrentValue (object defaultOriginValue, object defaultDestinationValue, System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock animationClock);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance object GetCurrentValue(object defaultOriginValue, object defaultDestinationValue, class System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock animationClock) cil managed
public: override System::Object ^ GetCurrentValue(System::Object ^ defaultOriginValue, System::Object ^ defaultDestinationValue, System::Windows::Media::Animation::AnimationClock ^ animationClock);

param.name: defaultOriginValue
param.span: 如果动画不具有其自己的起始值，则为动画提供原始值。

span.span: The origin value provided to the animation if the animation does not have its own start value.

param.name: defaultDestinationValue
param.span: 如果动画没有自己的目标值，则为提供给动画的目标值。

span.span: The destination value provided to the animation if the animation does not have its own destination value.

param.name: animationClock
param.span: 一个 ，它可以生成供动画用来生成它的输出值的 或 值。

span.span: The which can generate the or value to be used by the animation to generate its output value.
Gets the current value of the animation.
The current value of the animation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值`defaultOriginValue`参数取决于组合链中的动画的位置：The value of the `defaultOriginValue` parameter depends on the animation’s position in the composition chain: - 如果动画处于组合链中的第一个位置，它将替换为另一个动画，`defaultOriginValue`是它已替换时该动画的输出。If the animation is in the first position in a composition chain and it replaces another animation, `defaultOriginValue` is the output of that animation at the time it was replaced. - 如果动画处于组合链中的第一个位置，以及任何动画是否存在，若要替换，`defaultOriginValue`是经过动画处理的属性的基值。If the animation is in the first position in a composition chain and no animation exists to replace, `defaultOriginValue` is the base value of the animated property. - 如果此动画不处于组合的第一个位置链接，然后`defaultOriginValue`是由具有该组合链中前一动画的值不。If this animation is not in the first position of a composition chain, then `defaultOriginValue` is the value that is returned by the previous animation in the composition chain that has an that is not . 值`defaultDestinationValue`参数取决于是否没有以前的属性组合层。The value of the `defaultDestinationValue` parameter depends on whether there is a previous property composition layer. - 如果没有以前的属性组合层`defaultDestinationValue`是该层的输出。If there is a previous property composition layer, `defaultDestinationValue` is the output from that layer. - 如果没有以前的组合层，`defaultDestinationValue`是基本值进行动画处理的属性。If there is no previous composition layer, `defaultDestinationValue` is the base value of the property that you are animating. 有关动画组合的详细信息，请参阅[动画和计时系统概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md)。For more information about animation composition, see the [Animation and Timing System Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md). 有关创建自定义动画类型的详细信息，请参阅[自定义动画概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/custom-animations-overview.md)。For more information about creating custom animation types, see the [Custom Animations Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/custom-animations-overview.md).

public: float GetCurrentValue(float defaultOriginValue, float defaultDestinationValue, System::Windows::Media::Animation::AnimationClock ^ animationClock);

param.name: defaultOriginValue
param.span: 如果动画不具有其自己的起始值，则为动画提供原始值。

span.span: The origin value provided to the animation if the animation does not have its own start value.

param.name: defaultDestinationValue
param.span: 如果动画没有自己的目标值，则为提供给动画的目标值。

span.span: The destination value provided to the animation if the animation does not have its own destination value.

param.name: animationClock
param.span: 一个 ，它可以生成供动画用来生成它的输出值的 或 值。

span.span: The which can generate the or value to be used by the animation to generate its output value.
Gets the current value of the animation.
The current value of the animation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值`defaultOriginValue`参数取决于组合链中的动画的位置：The value of the `defaultOriginValue` parameter depends on the animation’s position in the composition chain: - 如果动画处于组合链中的第一个位置，它将替换为另一个动画，`defaultOriginValue`是它已替换时该动画的输出。If the animation is in the first position in a composition chain and it replaces another animation, `defaultOriginValue` is the output of that animation at the time it was replaced. - 如果动画处于组合链中的第一个位置，以及任何动画是否存在，若要替换，`defaultOriginValue`是经过动画处理的属性的基值。If the animation is in the first position in a composition chain and no animation exists to replace, `defaultOriginValue` is the base value of the animated property. - 如果此动画不处于组合的第一个位置链接，然后`defaultOriginValue`是由具有该组合链中前一动画的值不。If this animation is not in the first position of a composition chain, then `defaultOriginValue` is the value that is returned by the previous animation in the composition chain that has an that is not . 值`defaultDestinationValue`参数取决于是否没有以前的属性组合层。The value of the `defaultDestinationValue` parameter depends on whether there is a previous property composition layer. - 如果没有以前的属性组合层`defaultDestinationValue`是该层的输出。If there is a previous property composition layer, `defaultDestinationValue` is the output from that layer. - 如果没有以前的组合层，`defaultDestinationValue`是基本值进行动画处理的属性。If there is no previous composition layer, `defaultDestinationValue` is the base value of the property that you are animating. 有关动画组合的详细信息，请参阅[动画和计时系统概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md)。For more information about animation composition, see the [Animation and Timing System Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md). 有关创建自定义动画类型的详细信息，请参阅[自定义动画概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/custom-animations-overview.md)。For more information about creating custom animation types, see the [Custom Animations Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/custom-animations-overview.md).

MemberSignature.Value: protected abstract float GetCurrentValueCore (float defaultOriginValue, float defaultDestinationValue, System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock animationClock);

.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance float32 GetCurrentValueCore(float32 defaultOriginValue, float32 defaultDestinationValue, class System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock animationClock) cil managed
protected: abstract float GetCurrentValueCore(float defaultOriginValue, float defaultDestinationValue, System::Windows::Media::Animation::AnimationClock ^ animationClock);

param.name: defaultOriginValue
param.span: 建议使用的原始值。如果动画没有自己显式设置的起始值，则使用该值。

span.span: The suggested origin value, used if the animation does not have its own explicitly set start value.

param.name: defaultDestinationValue
param.span: 建议使用的目标值。如果动画没有自己显式设置的结束值，则使用该值。

span.span: The suggested destination value, used if the animation does not have its own explicitly set end value.

param.name: animationClock
param.span: 用于生成宿主动画使用的 或 的 。

span.span: An that generates the or used by the host animation.

summary.span: 计算一个值，该值表示正在进行动画处理的属性的当前值，并由主机动画确定。

span.span: Calculates a value that represents the current value of the property being animated, as determined by the host animation.

returns.span: 计算得出的属性值，该值由当前动画确定。

span.span: The calculated value of the property, as determined by the current animation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值`defaultOriginValue`参数取决于组合链中的动画的位置：The value of the `defaultOriginValue` parameter depends on the animation’s position in the composition chain: - 如果动画处于组合链中的第一个位置，它将替换为另一个动画，`defaultOriginValue`是它已替换时该动画的输出。If the animation is in the first position in a composition chain and it replaces another animation, `defaultOriginValue` is the output of that animation at the time it was replaced. - 如果动画处于组合链中的第一个位置，以及任何动画是否存在，若要替换，`defaultOriginValue`是经过动画处理的属性的基值。If the animation is in the first position in a composition chain and no animation exists to replace, `defaultOriginValue` is the base value of the animated property. - 如果此动画不处于组合的第一个位置链接，然后`defaultOriginValue`是由具有该组合链中前一动画的值不。If this animation is not in the first position of a composition chain, then `defaultOriginValue` is the value that is returned by the previous animation in the composition chain that has an that is not . 值`defaultDestinationValue`参数取决于是否没有以前的属性组合层。The value of the `defaultDestinationValue` parameter depends on whether there is a previous property composition layer. - 如果没有以前的属性组合层`defaultDestinationValue`是该层的输出。If there is a previous property composition layer, `defaultDestinationValue` is the output from that layer. - 如果没有以前的组合层，`defaultDestinationValue`是基本值进行动画处理的属性。If there is no previous composition layer, `defaultDestinationValue` is the base value of the property that you are animating. 有关动画组合的详细信息，请参阅[动画和计时系统概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md)。For more information about animation composition, see the [Animation and Timing System Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md). 有关创建自定义动画类型的详细信息，请参阅[自定义动画概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/custom-animations-overview.md)。For more information about creating custom animation types, see the [Custom Animations Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/custom-animations-overview.md).
